msg: svn merge -c 1402599 from trunk for HDFS-4112. A few improvements on INodeDirectory include adding a utility method for casting; avoiding creation of new empty lists; cleaning up some code and rewriting some javadoc.

author: markt
msg: Fix off-by-one errors and ensure offset is set when requested value is within cacheSize of the current cache range.
